Desc.entry: Nursing/residential care for adults aged 19-65 years with learning disabilities. Also provides residential nursing care for older people aged over 65 years. Also offers Voage Optons with flexible support and respite for families ie providing care outside the home rather than someone caring to live with them. This care home is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.
